title: pazani appan
sahitya:
pazhani appan tuNaiyE nambina pErkkup-pArinil yAvar illaiyE



anupallavi



kuzhagan kadirvaDi vERkkumaran amarar pOTrum azhagan shivappudalvan

Arumukhan guhan



caraNam



anjavarum paghaiyai panjupaDa udaippAn vanca niruttar vIzh shencuDar

vEleDuppAn

tanjamenravar tUya nenjinilE iruppAn tUnjAk-kuNDali shakti

konjik-kulAvuginra
